channel.title: Posing Productions - Award Winning Climbing Films
channel.description: Posing Productions presents, rock climbing films and dvds of the highest standard. The award winning team stocks popular climbing films including Stone Monkey, First Ascent, Set in Stone, Storms the Movie and E11.
channel.itunes:author: www.posingproductions.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast from Posing Productions, award winning adventure films and mountain photography

item.title: Reservoir Dogs
item.itunes:author: Posing Productions
item.description: The forth in our series of unseen archives from the Posing Productions' footage vault. This clip shows a head-point ascent featuring one of Gritstone's great lines; 'Reservoir Dogs' E8 7a at Widdop in Yorkshire. The piece was actually shot in 2008 whilst making the film 'On Sight', ironic. Great bit of hard climbing from Gaz Parry, music by James Frazer. www.posingproductions.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The forth in our series of unseen archives from the Posing Productions' footage vault. This clip shows a head-point ascent featuring one of Gritstone's great lines; 'Reservoir Dogs' E8 7a at Widdop in Yorkshire. The piece was actually shot in 2008 whil...

item.title: Rodellar Climbing with Steve McClure - Polecam Test
item.itunes:author: Posing Productions
item.description: The second in our series of unseen archives from the Posing Productions' footage vault. This clip was shot with a fancy polecam set up at the sport climbing area of Rodellar in Spain. Clip features top UK climber Steve McClure on a couple of routes including the classic 'The Dolphin' (El Delfin) 7c. Amazingly we never found a use for such quality footage, so here it is! www.posingproductions

item.title: The Frumious Bandersnatch
item.itunes:author: Posing Productions
item.description: The third in our series of unseen archives from the Posing Productions' footage vault. This clip is actually a bonus feature in the Moonflower dvd but we figured it'd be nice to give such a great ascent a bit more exposure. Here we see alpinist Nik Bullock making the first ascent of 'The Frumious Bandersnatch' (E7) at Rhoscolyn in North Wales. Flakey rock, run outs on marginal gear, a hippy and lots of psyche! www.posingproductions.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The third in our series of unseen archives from the Posing Productions' footage vault. This clip is actually a bonus feature in the Moonflower dvd but we figured it'd be nice to give such a great ascent a bit more exposure. Here we see alpinist Nik Bul...

item.title: Autana Trailer
item.itunes:author: Posing Productions
item.description: Epic new trailer from the latest Lee/Houlding picture; 'Autana - first ascent in the lost world'. Leo Houlding, Jason Pickles and Sean 'Stanley' Leary go deep into the Amazon to attempt a first ascent on the magnificent Cerro Autana. Adventure film making goes to the Venezuelan jungle, 'Indiana Jones would have been proud'. Out on HD download and dvd, August 2012. www.posingproductions.com

item.title: Psyche II Preview
item.itunes:author: Posing Productions
item.description:
Out for 2010 top film maker Alastair Lee presents PSYCHE II, the follow up to his successful 2007 film Psyche. Featuring Alastair's mix of stunning action from many of the UK's best climbers, slick editing and a cracking sound track. Psyche II looks set to be yet another hit from Posing Productions.
In this first preview of the new film we see some deep water soloing action in Pemborke with Neil Gresham, including a behind the scenes look at how some of the shots were acheived, its not pretty, you have been warned! www.posingproductions.com

item.description: The new Posing Productions film is going to involve a bit of filming in the Alps during winter. This means getting around in all types of snowy conditions. Film maker Alastair Lee checked himself in for a 3 day course with top mountain guide Andy Perkins. Alastair's vehicle of choice is a split board; its a snowboard for going down but splits into skis for going up... enjoy the 3 mins feature! www.climbingfilm.co.uk

item.title: SET IN STONE - CLIMBING FILM TRAILER
item.itunes:author: Posing Productions
item.description:
Official trailer for the superb climbing film - SET IN STONE. Dave Birkett climbs his many masterpieces in the stunning Lake District fells.
Featuring the first ascent of 'Return of the King' E9 6c - just one of many Lakeland masterpieces including the extraordinary "Nowt Burra Flee'in Thing" (E8 6c) - Cam Crag, Wasdale Screes. All filmed using innovative techniques, including 'The Brief History of Birkett ' animation which covers the 70 year Birkett family legacy.
www.posingproductions.com
